name: @circlesac/mcp-docs-server
description: Simple CLI for serving Markdown docs as an MCP server and packaging them for npm.

scripts.build: bunx rimraf dist && bunx tsc --project tsconfig.build.json
scripts.dev:docker: bun run build:docker && docker run --rm -v "$(pwd)/.build:/mcp-docs-server/.build" mcp-docs-server sh -c "cd /mcp-docs-server && npx @circlesac/mcp-docs-server cloudflare --dry-run" && cd .build/cloudflare && npx wrangler dev
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run scripts/check-version.ts && bun run build
